alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 14 at 6:59PM EST until December 14 at 7:45PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Jackson County in the Panhandle of Florida... Eastern Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 645 PM CST. * At 559 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Vernon, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Vernon, Chipley, Marianna, Graceville, Bradford, Cottondale, Alford, Wausau, Richter Crossroads, Holmes Valley, Jacobs, Smyrna, Bahoma, Sylvania, Johnson Crossroads, Brock Crossroad, Jacob City, Chipley Municipal Airport, Orange Hill and Kynesville. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CST for the Panhandle of Florida. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CST for the Panhandle of Florida.
